channel.itunes:subtitle: Recorded Live at the Wicked Ground Cafe, 289 8th Street, San Francisco, CA, USA
channel.itunes:author: Wicked Grounds
channel.itunes:summary:
Bi-Monthly Podcasts about BDSM, Sex, and more from the Wicked Grounds cafe in San Francisco, CA, USA
Do you want real talk?
The Wicked Grounds podcast is a collection of open converstations captured live at Wicked Grounds Cafe. Subjects can range from sex, relationships, politices, geekery, movies, more sex, you name it.
channel.description:
The Wicked Grounds podcast is a collection of open converstations captured live at Wicked Grounds Cafe. Subjects can range from sex, relationships, politices, geekery, movies, more sex, you name it.
Wicked Grounds first opened our doors September 16th 2009 just in time for the Folsom Street Fair. Over the next few years we became a beloved haven of the kink community of San Francisco and beyond. Frequently a place for munches, demonstrations, meetups and even the occasional porn shoot and garnering support from the community beyond what any of us could have imagined!
We are located at 289 8th Street, San Francisco, CA, USA. Please come visit!

item.title: WG1: Welcome to Wicked Grounds with Siouxsie Q
item.itunes:author: Various
item.itunes:subtitle: Our first podcast
item.itunes:summary: In our first episode, Ryan and Roo describe the history of the cafe and speak with special guest Siouxsie Q about some of her favorite things.

item.title: WG2: Siouxie Q Part 2
item.itunes:author: Various
item.itunes:subtitle: Siouxie Q and questions from the world.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Roo and Ryan talk to Siouxie about Food, ElfQuest, Virginity, Theater, and take questions from the audience.
